verses.verse: Ask <S%H7592><s%> ye of the <S%H4480>LORD<s%> <S%H3068><s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the latter <S%H4456>rain;<s%> so the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6213>make<s%> bright <S%H2385>clouds,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H1653>showers<s%> of <S%H4306>rain,<s%> to every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H6212>grass<s%> in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H8655>idols<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H205>vanity,<s%> and the <S%H7080>diviners<s%> have <S%H2372>seen<s%> a <S%H8267>lie,<s%> and have <S%H1696>told<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H2472>dreams;<s%> they <S%H5162>comfort<s%> in <S%H1892>vain:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they went their <S%H5265>way<s%> <S%H3644>as<s%> a <S%H6629>flock,<s%> they were <S%H6031>troubled,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd.<s%>

Mine <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> and I <S%H6485>punished<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H6260>goats:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H6485>visited<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5739>flock<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and hath <S%H7760>made<s%> them as his <S%H1935>goodly<s%> <S%H5483>horse<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

Out <S%H4480>of<s%> him came <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H6438>corner,<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> him the <S%H3489>nail,<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> him the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H7198>bow,<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> him <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5065>oppressor<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

And they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men, which tread <S%H947>down<s%> their enemies in the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle:<s%> and they shall <S%H3898>fight,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H5973>with<s%> them, and the <S%H7392>riders<s%> on <S%H5483>horses<s%> shall be <S%H954>confounded.<s%>

And I will <S%H1396>strengthen<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and I will <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and I will bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> to place them; <S%H3588>for<s%> I have mercy <S%H7355>upon<s%> them: and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H834>though<s%> I had <S%H3808>not<s%> cast them <S%H2186>off:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and will <S%H6030>hear<s%> them.

And they of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> like a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> man, and their <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> as <S%H3644>through<s%> <S%H3196>wine:<s%> yea, their <S%H1121>children<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and be <S%H8055>glad;<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

I will <S%H8319>hiss<s%> for them, and <S%H6908>gather<s%> them; <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> them: and they shall <S%H7235>increase<s%> <S%H3644>as<s%> they have <S%H7235>increased.<s%>

And I will <S%H2232>sow<s%> them among the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and they shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> me in far <S%H4801>countries;<s%> and they shall <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> their <S%H1121>children,<s%> and turn <S%H7725>again.<s%>

I will bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> also out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> them out of <S%H4480>Assyria;<s%> <S%H804><s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H3844>Lebanon;<s%> and place shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> for them.

And he shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with <S%H6869>affliction,<s%> and shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H1530>waves<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4688>deeps<s%> of the <S%H2975>river<s%> shall dry <S%H3001>up:<s%> and the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> shall be brought <S%H3381>down,<s%> and the <S%H7626>scepter<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall depart <S%H5493>away.<s%>
And I will <S%H1396>strengthen<s%> them in the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and they shall walk up and <S%H1980>down<s%> in his <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
